SELECT C.PJT_CD, C.PJT_NM, D.PJT_GB, A.COST_AMT1, A.COST_AMT2, A.COST_AMT3, B.TOT_CONTRACT_AMT
FROM T_p11090 A ,T_P11000 B ,T_SM3000 C ,T_P11000_H D WHERE A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD AND C.PJT_CD = A.PJT_CD AND D.PJT_CD = A.PJT_CD AND A.PJT_CD LIKE '%'+#{PJT_CD}+'%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT '20'+SUBSTRING(A.PJT_CD,1,2)YY ,A.PJT_CD ,B.PJT_NM ,C.DEPT_CD ,C.DEPT_NM FROM T_P11000 A ,T_SM3000 B ,T_SC1010 C
WHERE A.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND A.PJT_CD = B.PJT_CD)A
WHERE
A.YY LIKE '%'+#{YY}+'%'
AND
A.${selectedPJT} LIKE '%' + #{pjtValue} + '%'
